title: Dark Artist armor
info: The Dark Artist armor is a magic-oriented armor set purchased from the Tavernkeep for 2250000*225 (set), after Golem has been defeated. The set consists of the Dark Artist's Hat, Dark Artist's Robe and Dark Artist's Leggings. Wearing the full set increases the attack range of Flameburst sentry summons by 50%, allowing them to attack up to 84 blocks away. It also increases projectile velocity by 40% and increases the field of view significantly.
